default.label: Label
default.options.0.label: Option 1
default.options.1.label: Option 2
description:
Button for selecting from a drop-down list. Use this component when the list is long and only one option can be chosen. 

For short lists (2-4 items), it's better to use [field.radio-group](field.radio-group.md) or [field.button-radio-group](field.button-radio-group.md), where all the options are visible at once. 

To allow selecting multiple options, use the [field.checkbox-group](field.checkbox-group.md) component.
properties.options.items.default.label: Option
properties.options.items.properties.labe: The name of the option to display in the list.
properties.options.items.properties.valu: The value to write to the data in the `data` property.
properties.placeholder.description: The text that will be displayed if none of the options is selected.
